snippet: Religious leaders in Brooklyn’s ultra-Orthodox Jewish communities must ensure that molesters are brought to justice.
abstract: Editorial laments news that members of Brooklyn's ultra-Orthodox Jewish community have been covering up or ignoring reports of child molesters; urges its religious leaders and Brooklyn's district attorney Charles Hynes to do more to keep children safe and ensure that sexual predators are brought to justice.
lead_paragraph: Religious leaders in Brooklyn’s ultra-Orthodox Jewish communities must ensure that molesters are brought to justice.
